# Test fixtures for sanitizer testing

# OpenAI API keys
export OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz1234567890
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer sk-proj-abc123xyz456" https://api.openai.com/v1/chat

# GitHub tokens
git clone https://ghp_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx@github.com/user/repo.git
export GITHUB_TOKEN=gho_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

# AWS credentials
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE
export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY

# MySQL passwords
mysql -u admin --password=supersecret123 -h localhost database
mysql -u root -p secret_password

# Bearer tokens
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIn0" https://api.example.com

# URL credentials
git clone https://user:password123@github.com/org/repo.git
psql postgresql://admin:dbpassword@localhost:5432/mydb

# Generic API keys
curl -d "api_key=abc123def456ghi789jkl012mno345" https://api.service.com
API_KEY="my-super-secret-api-key-12345678"

# Private key header
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIEpAIBAAKCAQEA...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

# Token flags
docker login --token=my-registry-token
npm login --token=npm_abc123def456
